content: help me add a new project button, stlye it with a bule button. also re arrange the buttons, in the orders of:  new button, save button first, delete button
Added a new 'New Project' button and rearranged the button order as requested. Applied blue styling to the new button.
why on display, it's showing in the order of delete, save, then new? please reverse it
The order of the buttons (new project, save project, clear cache) has been reversed as requested.
